verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H935>Go<s%> in unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>: for I have <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, that I might <S%H7896>shew<s%> these my <S%H226>signs<s%> <S%H7130>before<s%> him:

And that thou mayest <S%H5608>tell<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, and of thy <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, what things I have <S%H5953>wrought<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and my <S%H226>signs<s%> which I have <S%H7760>done<s%> among them; that ye may <S%H3045>know<s%> how that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%>, How <S%H4970>long<s%> wilt thou <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H6031>humble<s%> thyself <S%H6440>before<s%> me? let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.

<S%H3588>Else<s%>, if thou <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, behold, to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H697>locusts<s%> into thy <S%H1366>coast<s%>:

And they shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H5869>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, that one cannot be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of that which is <S%H6413>escaped<s%>, which <S%H7604>remaineth<s%> unto you from the <S%H1259>hail<s%>, and shall <S%H398>eat<s%> every <S%H6086>tree<s%> which <S%H6779>groweth<s%> for you out of the <S%H7704>field<s%>:

And they shall <S%H4390>fill<s%> thy <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of all thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of all the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>; which neither thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, nor thy <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%>, since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that they were upon the <S%H127>earth<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>. And he <S%H6437>turned<s%> himself, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, How long shall this man be a <S%H4170>snare<s%> unto us? let the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H3045>knowest<s%> thou not <S%H2962>yet<s%> that <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is <S%H6>destroyed<s%>?

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> were brought <S%H7725>again<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: but who are they that shall <S%H1980>go<s%>?

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, We will <S%H3212>go<s%> with our <S%H5288>young<s%> and with our <S%H2205>old<s%>, with our <S%H1121>sons<s%> and with our <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, with our <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and with our <S%H1241>herds<s%> will we <S%H3212>go<s%>; for we must hold a <S%H2282>feast<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Let the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be so with you, as I will let you <S%H7971>go<s%>, and your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>: <S%H7200>look<s%> to it; for <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> you.

Not so: <S%H3212>go<s%> now ye that are <S%H1397>men<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; for that ye did <S%H1245>desire<s%>. And they were driven <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H6440>presence<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for the <S%H697>locusts<s%>, that they may come <S%H5927>up<s%> upon the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> every <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, even all that the <S%H1259>hail<s%> hath <S%H7604>left<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> stretched <S%H5186>forth<s%> his <S%H4294>rod<s%> over the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5090>brought<s%> an <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> upon the <S%H776>land<s%> all that <S%H3117>day<s%>, and all that <S%H3915>night<s%>; and when it was <S%H1242>morning<s%>, the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5375>brought<s%> the <S%H697>locusts<s%>.

And the <S%H697>locusts<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> over all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H5117>rested<s%> in all the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>grievous<s%> were they; <S%H6440>before<s%> them there were no <S%H3651>such<s%> <S%H697>locusts<s%> as they, neither <S%H310>after<s%> them shall be such.

For they <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H5869>face<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>, so that the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H2821>darkened<s%>; and they did <S%H398>eat<s%> every <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and all the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>trees<s%> which the <S%H1259>hail<s%> had <S%H3498>left<s%>: and there <S%H3498>remained<s%> not any green <S%H3418>thing<s%> in the <S%H6086>trees<s%>, or in the <S%H6212>herbs<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, through all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in <S%H4116>haste<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%>, I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and against you.

Now therefore <S%H5375>forgive<s%>, I pray thee, my <S%H2403>sin<s%> only this <S%H6471>once<s%>, and <S%H6279>intreat<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, that he may take <S%H5493>away<s%> from me this <S%H4194>death<s%> only.
And he went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and <S%H6279>intreated<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> a <S%H3966>mighty<s%> <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%>, which took <S%H5375>away<s%> the <S%H697>locusts<s%>, and <S%H8628>cast<s%> them into the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>; there <S%H7604>remained<s%> not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H697>locust<s%> in all the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, so that he would not let the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, that there may be <S%H2822>darkness<s%> over the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, even <S%H2822>darkness<s%> which may be <S%H4959>felt<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> stretched <S%H5186>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; and there was a <S%H653>thick<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>:

They <S%H7200>saw<s%> not <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another<s%>, neither <S%H6965>rose<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> from his place for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: but all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H216>light<s%> in their <S%H4186>dwellings<s%>.

¶ And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> ye, <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; only let your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and your <S%H1241>herds<s%> be <S%H3322>stayed<s%>: let your little <S%H2945>ones<s%> also <S%H3212>go<s%> with you.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou must <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3027>us<s%> also <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> and burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, that we may <S%H6213>sacrifice<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>.

Our <S%H4735>cattle<s%> also shall <S%H3212>go<s%> with us; there shall not an <S%H6541>hoof<s%> be left <S%H7604>behind<s%>; for thereof must we <S%H3947>take<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>; and we <S%H3045>know<s%> not with what we must <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, until we <S%H935>come<s%> thither.
¶ But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and he <S%H14>would<s%> not let them <S%H7971>go<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3212>Get<s%> thee from me, take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to thyself, <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> no <S%H3254>more<s%>; for in that <S%H3117>day<s%> thou <S%H7200>seest<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> thou shalt <S%H4191>die<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H3651>well<s%>, I will <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> no more.
